Html: I created a Shadow with 5515 Sustained DPS for 20 Minutes, all Buffs included, can that even be possible? He has to go OOM sometime. Best DPS Numer I found on WWS was 4937 DPS on Flickwerk.

What numbers are wrong?

The 5515 Sustained DPS is based on the potential damage if the player never does a mistake and plays 100% optimal. And no, at such a level of raid buffs and gear, a ShadowPriest has enough cooldowns to keep him going for 20+ minutes.

With all buffs, it's pretty damn hard to go oom for almost any class.  5515 may be doable for a spriest with the best gear available.  I haven't heard of any priests getting that high on patchwerk though =/  Mages, definately, but spriests?  Not so sure.
